findings.rationale: The indefinite duration of confidentiality obligations can lead to unforeseen liabilities and complications for both parties in the long term.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The lack of a limitation on liability exposes both parties to potentially significant financial risks in case of breaches or claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A could disadvantage Company B, especially if they invest significant resources in the development of work products.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The indemnification clause without limits may result in significant financial exposure for the indemnifying party in case of claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.
